entry.source: 〉 Power dwells in {F843,0}'s weapon.{F801}It can now drive away weak demons.{F801}{F802}
entry.target: 〉 Poder reside na espada de {F843,0}.{F801}Ela agora pode espantar demonios fracos.{F801}{F802}
